name: BROOMSTICK DD6
description:
THIS IS OLD. NEW IS HERE.

Hi!

This is a demo for a game about flying around on a broomstick and casting spells to help save the world or something like that. It's still pretty early in development and is pretty rough in most places, but I hope you can still have fun with it.

Thanks!

Sebastian

p.s. I made the race timers longer and made them reset when you respawn (or just hang out at the bench) so it might be a bit easier now.
